name: JumpGame (bp269)
description:
'JumpGame' is a janky first person platformer where you have to get to the end of the level without falling into pits or touching incandescent spikes and spinning blades.

This build of the game has slightly more bareable mouse controls and a wider fov, as well as fixing a bug where the mouse wouldn't show on the title screen after completing the game 

It is the first game project I finished back in 2017 and I'm currently working on a remake of it.
